texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: UPDATE:  The TRACE/TRACK methods are disabled in Plesk 8.4 right out of the box!
texts.text: UPDATE:  The TRACE/TRACK methods are disabled in Plesk 8.4 right out of the box!

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: It's always been a  bit of a challenge  to disable TRACE and TRACK methods with Plesk. The only available options were to create a ton of vhost.conf files or adjust the httpd.include files and prevent modifications with
texts.text: It's always been a  bit of a challenge  to disable TRACE and TRACK methods with Plesk. The only available options were to create a ton of vhost.conf files or adjust the httpd.include files and prevent modifications with

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: (which is a bad idea on many levels).
texts.text: (which is a bad idea on many levels).

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Luckily, Parallels has made things easier with a  new knowledge base article .
texts.text: Luckily, Parallels has made things easier with a  new knowledge base article .
